titleStmt.title: All ordinances and orders for the better observation of the Lords-Day and the fast 9. Decemb. 1646. ordered &c. that the ordinances for the better observation of the publick dayes of fast and humiliation and for the better observation of the Lords-Day be printed together ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Laws, statutes, etc.
England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Edw. Husband, Printer to the Honourable House of Commons,
